problem_names: lemma intpow_plus: "x > 0 \<Longrightarrow> x ^\<^sub>Z (m + n) = x ^\<^sub>Z m * x ^\<^sub>Z n"
lemma intpow_mult_combine: "x > 0 \<Longrightarrow> x ^\<^sub>Z m * (x ^\<^sub>Z n * y) = x ^\<^sub>Z (m + n) * y"
lemma intpow_pos [simp]: "n \<ge> 0 \<Longrightarrow> x ^\<^sub>Z n = x ^ nat n"
lemma intpow_uminus_nat: "n \<ge> 0 \<Longrightarrow> x ^\<^sub>Z -n = inverse (x ^ nat n)"
lemma intpow_inverse: "inverse a ^\<^sub>Z n = inverse (a ^\<^sub>Z n)"
lemma intpow_mult_distrib: "(x * y) ^\<^sub>Z m = x ^\<^sub>Z m * y ^\<^sub>Z m"
translations:
proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (0::'a) < x \<Longrightarrow> (0::'a) < x ^\<^sub>Z n
lemma intpow_plus: "x > 0 \<Longrightarrow> x ^\<^sub>Z (m + n) = x ^\<^sub>Z m * x ^\<^sub>Z n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (0::'a) < x \<Longrightarrow>
    x ^\<^sub>Z (m + n) = x ^\<^sub>Z m * x ^\<^sub>Z n

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (0::'a) < x \<Longrightarrow>
    (m < 0 \<longrightarrow>
     (n < 0 \<longrightarrow>
      x ^ nat (- m) * x ^ nat (- n) = x ^ nat (- m - n)) \<and>
     (\<not> n < 0 \<longrightarrow>
      (m + n < 0 \<longrightarrow>
       x ^ nat (- m) = x ^ nat n * x ^ nat (- m - n)) \<and>
      (\<not> m + n < 0 \<longrightarrow>
       x ^ nat (- m) * x ^ nat (m + n) = x ^ nat n))) \<and>
    (\<not> m < 0 \<longrightarrow>
     (n < 0 \<longrightarrow>
      (m + n < 0 \<longrightarrow>
       x ^ nat (- n) = x ^ nat m * x ^ nat (- m - n)) \<and>
      (\<not> m + n < 0 \<longrightarrow>
       x ^ nat (- n) * x ^ nat (m + n) = x ^ nat m)) \<and>
     (\<not> n < 0 \<longrightarrow>
      x ^ nat (m + n) = x ^ nat m * x ^ nat n))
apply (metis (no_types, hide_lams) abs_ge_zero add.commute add_diff_cancel_right' nat_add_distrib power_add uminus_add_conv_diff zabs_def)
lemma intpow_mult_combine: "x > 0 \<Longrightarrow> x ^\<^sub>Z m * (x ^\<^sub>Z n * y) = x ^\<^sub>Z (m + n) * y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (0::'a) < x \<Longrightarrow>
    x ^\<^sub>Z m * (x ^\<^sub>Z n * y) = x ^\<^sub>Z (m + n) * y
lemma intpow_pos [simp]: "n \<ge> 0 \<Longrightarrow> x ^\<^sub>Z n = x ^ nat n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 0 \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> x ^\<^sub>Z n = x ^ nat n

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x ^\<^sub>Z - n = inverse (x ^\<^sub>Z n)
lemma intpow_uminus_nat: "n \<ge> 0 \<Longrightarrow> x ^\<^sub>Z -n = inverse (x ^ nat n)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 0 \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> x ^\<^sub>Z - n = inverse (x ^ nat n)
lemma intpow_inverse: "inverse a ^\<^sub>Z n = inverse (a ^\<^sub>Z n)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inverse a ^\<^sub>Z n = inverse (a ^\<^sub>Z n)
lemma intpow_mult_distrib: "(x * y) ^\<^sub>Z m = x ^\<^sub>Z m * y ^\<^sub>Z m"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x * y) ^\<^sub>Z m = x ^\<^sub>Z m * y ^\<^sub>Z m
